English: Can I buy you a drink?
I'd like to get to know you better
Would you like to go for coffee sometime?
What do you do for a living?

Spanish: ¿Tienes planes para el fin de semana?
English: Do you have any plans for the weekend?

Spanish: Lo estoy pasando muy bien contigo
English: I'm having a great time with you
Could we see each other again?

Spanish: Me encanta tu sentido del humor
English: I love your sense of humor
